DISCIPLINEBONUS.bonus: Can spend Karma for Willpower-only Test
Can spend Karma for Perception-only Test
Can spend Karma for Spell Effect Test

SPELL.effect: +3 Physical Armor, +3 Fatigue Test bonus vs. heat
SPELL.name: Air Armor

SPELL.effectarea: 60-degree arc from an origin hex adjacent to the spellcaster towards the target hex, up to the spell's range. For every 2 yards (1 hex) length away from the caster, the effect expands by 2 yards (1 hex) in width.
SPELL.name: Air Blast

SPELL.effect: +3 to Spell and Social Defense; +3 Willpower Test bonus against fear
SPELL.name: Assuring Touch

SPELL.effect: +6 bonus to Action Tests involving climbing or balancing
SPELL.name: Catwalk

SPELL.effect: Causes a Harried penalty to targets' Action Tests requiring sight, hearing, or smell
SPELL.name: Dust Devil

SPELL.effectarea: 100-square-yard area, no greater than 20 yards (10 hexes) in any dimension
SPELL.name: Icy Surface

SPELL.effectarea: Up to 4-yard (2-hex) high, 20 yard (10-hex) wide, 2-yard (1-hex) thick wall
SPELL.name: Living Wall

SPELL.effect: Summons spirit wings to guide the caster home
SPELL.name: Path Home

SPELL.effect: +3 Physical and Mystic Armor vs. cold
SPELL.name: Resist Cold

SPELL.effect: Summons a spirit guide to answer a question
SPELL.name: Spiritual Guidance

SPELL.effect: Merges caster's body with a tree to hide him
SPELL.name: Tree Merge

DISCIPLINEBONUS.bonus: Can spend Karma for Perception-only Test

SPELL.effect: Bonus Recovery Test; +4 Recovery Test bonus
SPELL.name: Healing Sleep

SPELL.effect: Sets alarm to go off at specified time
SPELL.name: Wake-Up Call
